title: The Battle of Gettysburg, Part III
itunes:title: The Battle of Gettysburg, Part III (Remastered/Rebooted/Remade)
description: In this next installment of the "Remastered/Rebooted/Remade" Series, Avery, Tony & Codie wrap up the Gettysburg Trilogy by discussing the events of July 3rd, 1863. The guys discuss the bloody, morning fight on Culp's Hill, the clash at East Cavalry Field and the most climactic event of the entire battle: "Pickett's Charge". Strap in for the explosive finale of the Battle of Gettysburg Trilogy filled with improved audio, big laughs, and Codie's returning facial hair. Enjoy!
